navigation.question: How confident did you feel navigating during the test?
navigation.reason: I stumbled upon the DIY that I was looking for. There were multiple locations that I thought it could be in.
navigation.simplifiedReason: I found it by accident and it feels like I shouldn't have found it there. (Lighting & Ceiling Fans Ideas & Projects Section)

cart.question: How confident do you feel about what's in your cart?
cart.reason: I feel fairly confident. The necessary products for my task was right there when I opened the page.
cart.simplifiedReason: I feel fairly confident. The necessary products for my project seems like it would be there.

instructions.question: How useful did you find the instructions provided in How to Sync Your Lights?
instructions.reason: I feel that it is very useful instructions. I can follow through step by step once I download the necessary app and connect my lights easily.
instructions.simplifiedReason: I can follow through step by step once I download the necessary app and connect my lights easily.

materials: 12 in. Multi-Color Smart Wi-Fi LED 4X Beam Light Kit

feedback.question: What general feedback do you have?
feedback.response: The website is very confusing. It doesn't have a clear structure and it's hard to find the DIY that I'm looking for.
feedback.simplifiedResponse: I would prefer a search bar. Not having that makes my life hard.

useDIY.question: Would you use the DIY section of Home Depot for your own applications/projects?
useDIY.reason: I didn't know that Home depot had a DIY section before. Hopefully I can use it now when I have issues around my house that are too small to ask my landlord for help with.
useDIY.simplifiedReason: I didn't know Home depot had this section. I would use it for small issues around my house.

navigation.simplifiedReason: Well it had to be somewhere, so I just thought where they would categorize it.

useDIY.question: Would you use the DIY section of Home Depot for your own applications/projects?
useDIY.reason: I would use the DIY section if I was looking to renovate my house/room and wanted inspiration or if I had a specific thing I wanted like the lights in this example that I know is popular and would think they would have a section on.
useDIY.simplifiedReason: I would use the DIY section if I wanted inspiration to renovate my house.
